sentences.en: Algorithm of bidirectional associative memory ( BAM ) is depicted.
sentences.cn: 分析了双向 互联 想记忆网络的算法结构.

sentences.en: And this seems very associative with TV animation.
sentences.cn: 这似乎非常联想与电视动画.

sentences.en: Associative memory is a basic function of human brain.
sentences.cn: 联想记忆是人脑的一项重要功能.

sentences.en: Describe the differences between an associative container and a sequential container.
sentences.cn: 描述关联容器和顺序容器的差别.

sentences.en: Elements in an associative container are ordered by key rather than sequentially.
sentences.cn: 关联容器中的元素不是顺序排列,而是按键(key)排序的.

sentences.en: Grasp Property and the Associative Property of Addition.
sentences.cn: 掌握加法交换律和加法结合律,培养学生初步的归纳推理能力.

sentences.en: Multiplication and addition are associative operations.
sentences.cn: 乘法和加法是结合性运算.

sentences.en: The associative containers share many operations with the sequential containers.
sentences.cn: 关联容器共享了顺序容器的许多操作.

sentences.en: The associative guilt was ingrained in his soul.
sentences.cn: 由此产生的内疚感在他灵魂深处挥之不去。

sentences.en: the brain’s ability to form associative links between different things
sentences.cn: 大脑通过联想把不同事物联系起来的能力

sentences.en: The elements in an associative container are ordered and accessed by key.
sentences.cn: 关联容器的元素按键排序和访问.

sentences.en: The library also defines several associative containers.
sentences.cn: 标准库还定义了几种关联容器.

sentences.en: The problem is that the key in an associative container is const.
The real picture is more horrific and stronger but one must conjure up all the associative thoughts and emotions it evokes.
sentences.cn: 真实的画面更恐怖也更震撼，但是它带来的种种感受和情绪需要你自己去联想。

sentences.en: This is the Associative Property of Multiplication. Read after me, please.
sentences.cn: 师:这就是乘法结合律, 请跟着老师读.

sentences.en: Two criteria reducibility of presentations of finite dimensional associative algebras are presented.
sentences.cn: 给出有限维结合代数上表示可约性的两个判别法.

words.tran_cn: 协会，联盟，社团；联合；联想
联想心理学；观念联合论
联系（associate的过去式和过去分词）
联想；使联合；使发生联系

phrases.tran_cn: [心理]联想记忆；[信息]（计算机的）联合存储器
